title: Cizzle (formerly Resonance)
about:
C﻿izzle is an application for media and comms professionals. It centralizes and provides insight into user advertising campaigns.

My contribution included collaborating with the client to modernize the application's design for improved user experience. I also implemented automation solutions to streamline manual data entry tasks, ultimately enhancing efficiency. Additionally, I provided ongoing updates and modifications to ensure Cizzle's continued functionality and performance.

T﻿he website was developed using HTML/CSS and PHP.
